H0.text: who led the mexican army at the battle of the alamo. Antonio López de Santa Anna

H1.text: who led the mexican army at the battle of the alamo. Manuel Castrillón

H2.text: who led the mexican army at the battle of the alamo. Martín Perfecto de Cós

H3.text: who led the mexican army at the battle of the alamo. Joaquín Amaro

A4.text: Santa Anna's forces killed 189 Texan defenders at the Battle of the Alamo on 6 March 1836.
